QuestData.Title: Understanding The Shado-Pan
QuestData.Description: The Shado-Pan rank among Pandaria's oldest defenders.$B$BFor years we train in our snow-capped monastery high in the Kun-Lai Summit, perfecting the martial secrets passed down by our ancestors.$B$BOur numbers may seem few, but a single Shado-Pan can be deadlier than a hundred trained soldiers.$B$BTo join the Shado-Pan order is a long journey full of hardship. If this is the path you seek, then you must first prove your worth.$B$BThere is urgent work to be done here. Help the Golden Lotus defend the Vale.
QuestData.LogDescription: Earn Revered standing with the Golden Lotus.
